Sentece: In the rat, a peak blood level, equivalent to 2 microgram/ml of trilostane, was observed following a 25 mg/kg oral dose; excretion was mainly via the feces.
Title: Disposition of trilostane in the rat and monkey.
Name: Trilostane

Sentece: In the monkey, the peak plasma level, equivalent to 15 microgram/ml, was observed 2 hr after a 20 mg/kg oral dose; elimination of radioactivity was predominantly in the urine.
Title: Disposition of trilostane in the rat and monkey.
Name: Trilostane
